10. [31mUltraLink Data Export ‚Ä∫ KIF Format Export ‚Ä∫ should export to KIF format with correct structure[0m
   üìÑ File: tests/unit/data-export.test.js
   üî¥ expect(received).toContain(expected) // indexOf

Expected substring: "(= (startDate-manages person1 project1) \"2023-01-01\")"
Received string:    ";; UltraLink Knowledge Interchange Format (KIF) Export
;; Generated: 2025-03-05T00:58:29.291Z
;; Entities and their attributes
(instance person1 Person)
(name person1 \"Alice\")
(age person1 30)¬∑
(instance person2 Person)
(name person2 \"Bob\")
(age person2 25)¬∑
(instance project1 Project)
(title project1 \"Project Alpha\")
(status project1 \"active\")¬∑
;; Relationships
(manages person1 project1)
(contributes_to person2 project1)¬∑
;; Meta-knowledge
(= (entityCount UltraLinkExport) 3)
(= (relationshipCount UltraLinkExport) 2)
(= (exportDate UltraLinkExport) \"2025-03-05T00:58:29.291Z\")
(= (exportVersion UltraLinkExport) \"1.0\")¬∑
;; Functions
(deffunction relationshipCount (?kb)
  :documentation \"Returns the total number of relationships in a knowledge base\"
  :return-type Integer)¬∑
(deffunction entityCount (?kb)
  :documentation \"Returns the total number of entities in a knowledge base\"
  :return-type Integer)¬∑
;; Rules
(defrule temporal-ordering
  :documentation \"Rule for temporal ordering of events\"
  (and (instance ?e1 Event)
       (instance ?e2 Event)
       (date ?e1 ?d1)
       (date ?e2 ?d2)
       (evaluate ?before (string< ?d1 ?d2)))
  (before ?e1 ?e2))
"
